Frequently Asked Questions

Why is my data at risk now?

Quantum computers threaten widely used algorithms like RSA, ECC, and even AES-128 in the long term. What once took centuries to break could be cracked in hours or minutes.

What are quantum computers?

They use qubits instead of bits, enabling superposition and entanglement. This allows them to solve certain problems (like factoring large numbers) exponentially faster than classical computers.

What is quantum-resistant cryptography?

A family of algorithms designed to remain secure even against powerful quantum computers. Examples include lattice-based (Kyber), hash-based, code-based, and multivariate schemes.

How is QuantumSure different from other password managers?

QuantumSure is built from the ground up for post-quantum security using NIST-approved algorithms, zero-knowledge architecture, and unique sharing features — while most existing vaults will become vulnerable.

How does QuantumSure protect my data?

We use Kyber-1024 for key encapsulation, Fernet-like authenticated encryption, and proprietary decoy mechanisms — all performed client-side. Your Master Password and plaintext data are never sent to our servers.

Do I need to give you my sensitive data?

No. All encryption happens in your browser. We only store encrypted blobs and never see your passwords, keys, or Master Password.

I forgot my Master Password — can you help?

No — and that's by design. We never store your Master Password or recovery phrase. Keep them safe.

What are the pricing plans?

• Individual / Small Team: $5.99/mo – 1,000 encrypt requests
• Business: $12.99/mo – 15,000 encrypt requests
• Enterprise: $49.99/mo – 100,000 encrypt requests
Custom tiers available — contact us.

Where can I sign up?

Start with the free trial on the Plans page. For custom needs, reach out to resurgencelabsofficial@gmail.com.
